programme.title: MLB Plays of the Week
programme.desc: This weekly MLB highlights show showcases the most exciting plays from the past week's matches.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League: Stories of the Finals
programme.desc: Take a look back at Borussia Dortmund's 1997 UEFA Champions League final success against Juventus. The German side conquered Europe after a 3-1 victory in Munich.

programme.title: Live: Women's Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from Victoria Park as Collingwood take on an in-form Sydney Swans side, who are looking to make it five wins out of five.

programme.title: Live: Women's Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the AFLW as Port Adelaide take on Melbourne at Alberton Oval. The Demons have won their opening four games, while the Magpies have just one victory so far.

programme.title: Premier League Preview
programme.desc: A look ahead to all the upcoming action in matchday four of the Premier League, featuring Arsenal v Nottm Forest, West Ham v Spurs and Man City v Man United.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League second semi-final between Adelaide Crows and Hawthorn at Adelaide Oval.

programme.title: Premier League Preview
programme.desc: A look ahead to all the upcoming action in matchday four of the Premier League, featuring Arsenal v Nottm Forest, West Ham v Spurs and Man City v Man United.

programme.title: Match Officials Mic'd Up
programme.desc: PGMOL chief Howard Webb reviews the decision-making process for five key incidents in the Premier League, including Josh King's controversial disallowed goal against Chelsea.

programme.title: Live: Premier League
programme.desc: After an early setback in their Premier League title challenge, Arsenal look to bounce back as they host a dangerous Nottingham Forest side at Emirates Stadium.

programme.title: Xtra Time
programme.desc: Post-match reaction from the Premier League clash between Arsenal and Nottingham Forest at Emirates Stadium.

programme.desc: Action from the penultimate stage of the 2025 La Vuelta, as the riders tackle over 4,100m of climbing on a 156km route from Robledo de Chavela to Bola del Mundo.

programme.title: TNT Sports Films
programme.desc: What does the future hold for cycling in the battle against global warming? Reshmin Chowdhury meets people at all levels to discuss how cycling can be a positive force for change.

programme.title: Live: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Igor Tudor's Juventus aim to make it three wins from three as rivals Inter visit the Allianz Stadium desperate to recover from their setback against Udinese.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Magazine
programme.desc: The latest news and updates from the UEFA Champions League.

programme.desc: Action from the UFC Fight Prelims at Frost Bank Center in San Antonio, Texas, ahead of the featherweight bout between Diego Lopes and Jean Silva.

programme.desc: Action from the AFLW as Brisbane Lions face North Melbourne Tasmanian Kangaroos at Brighton Homes Arena. Can the Roos continue their perfect start to the season?

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: Ben Johnson returns to Detroit as his Bears line up against the Lions. Johnson spent six years in the Detroit organization, but his Chicago tenure began with a shocking 27-24 loss to Minnesota. The Lions fell flat in a 27-13 road loss to the Packers.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Colts seek their first 2-0 start since 2009 as they host the Broncos. Daniel Jones passed for 272 yards and accounted for three touchdowns, two on the ground, in his Indianapolis debut, a 33-8 victory over Miami. Denver survived Tennessee 20-12.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: Host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recap the day's NFL highlights. Jac Collinsworth and Rodney Harrison contribute on-site.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: Edwin van der Sar has faced down pressure on the biggest stages in world football, but his toughest battle came after retirement. In 2023, the legendary goalkeeper suffered a life-threatening brain haemorrhage. In this episode Edwin opens up on his recovery and looks back on his career at the top that redefined goalkeeping. From Champions League glory with Ajax and Manchester United to his command

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The East-leading Tiger-Cats (7-5) aim to grow their advantage when they host the Blue Bombers (6-6). Hamilton is 2-4 against Western Conference foes this season. Winnipeg has won seven of its last nine meetings with Hamilton, including two Grey Cups.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Redblacks visit the Lions. Ottawa earned a come-from-behind 34-33 victory in the first leg of the home-and-home Sept. 5. Redblacks quarterback Dustin Crum ran for two scores and threw the game-winning TD pass to Eugene Lewis in the final minute.

programme.title: Live: College GameDay
programme.desc: Originating from the site of Saturday's biggest games, host Rece Davis and analysts Lee Corso, Kirk Herbstreit, Desmond Howard, Pat McAfee, and Nick Saban cover college football with pregame breakdowns, exclusive interviews, features and predictions.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 19 Crimson Tide (1-1) prepare for another test as they host the Badgers (2-0) in Week 3. Alabama got on the board with a 73-0 dismantling of Louisiana Monroe on Sept. 6. Bama rolled to a 42-10 verdict over Wisconsin on Sept. 14, 2024.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: A heavyweight bout in the SEC sees the No. 15 Volunteers (2-0) hosting the No. 6 Bulldogs (2-0). Georgia's 31-17 victory last season was its eighth in a row over Tennessee. Bulldogs tight end Oscar Delp had a pair of TD catches in the 2024 win.

programme.title: Live: College Football Scoreboard
programme.desc: Presenting up-to-the-minute scores and highlights during the college football season.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Gators and No. 3 Tigers meet in Death Valley. In Week 2, LSU moved to 2-0 with a win over Louisiana Tech, while Florida suffered a shocking home loss to South Florida. The Gators snapped a five-game slide with a 27-16 win over the Tigers in 2024.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Alouettes (5-7) steel themselves as they travel to face the CFL-leading Roughriders (10-2). Saskatchewan dominated Montreal 34-6 in La Belle Province on Aug. 2. Riders receiver Dohnte Meyers hauled in five catches for 136 yards in the victory.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Elks charge onto BMO Field for this game against the Argonauts. Edmonton won the Labour Day Classic rematch with Calgary for a third straight year on Sept. 6. Justin Rankin (EDM) rushed for 204 yards and two touchdowns in the 31-19 victory.
